sentences.en: "In the sole of the Wellington boot there's a thermocouple and if you apply heat to one side of the thermocouple and cold to the other side it generates an electrical charge, " Pain said.
sentences.cn: 佩恩说：“长筒靴的鞋底处有一个热电偶，如果电偶的一面受热，而另一面受冷，就会产生电荷。”

sentences.en: A double - membranous Surface thermocouple used in ceramic materials has been developed.
sentences.cn: 针对陶瓷材料的特点,研制了一种双薄膜式表面热电偶.

sentences.en: A thermocouple made of platinum / platinumrhodium provides the accurate temperature sensing.
sentences.cn: 由铂或铂铑组成的热电偶给出精确的温度指示.

sentences.en: Generally the thermocouple emf will be measured using a digital voltmeter.
sentences.cn: 一般来说,热电偶电动势将成为衡量使用数字电压表.

sentences.en: Input. Determine inputs, such as thermocouple signals, timer, or analytical test results.
sentences.cn: 输入. 确定输入, 比如热电偶信号, 定时器, 或分析测试结果.

sentences.en: It could be resistivity, if you have a thermocouple.
sentences.cn: 如果你有个热电偶，它也可以是电阻率。

sentences.en: Reference junction compensation is required for thermocouple measurement with voltmeters.
sentences.cn: 参考交界补偿所需的热电偶测量电压表.

sentences.en: Temperature - measuring thermocouple. Type of heating element and polarity symbols can be specified.
sentences.cn: 温度测量热电偶. 可指定加热单元和极性符号的类型.

sentences.en: The ambient temperature shall be measured by means of a thermocouple.
sentences.cn: 灯具工作现场的温度应当采取热电偶的方式来测.

sentences.en: The results were coincident withthe. calculated data and the thermocouple measurements.
sentences.cn: 测得的刀具表面温度与理论结果及热电偶方法所得结果相符合.

sentences.en: The sample temperature was controlled by a Chromel_Alumel thermocouple with a precision on the order of 0.1℃.
sentences.cn: 样品温度用Chromel-Alumel热电偶控制，其精度在0.1℃左右。

sentences.en: The simplest version of the thermocouple gage consists of a resistance wire.
sentences.cn: 最简单的热电偶真空计是由电阻丝组成.

sentences.en: The temperature is sensed by a thermocouple located in the vapour space.
sentences.cn: 该温度由位于蒸气空间的热电偶所测出.

sentences.en: The thermocouple junction relative to the specimen's surface was hence under control.
sentences.cn: 热电偶交界相对试样的表面热电偶,因此受到控制.

sentences.en: The transmitter is wired for up - scale thermocouple burn - out protection.
sentences.cn: 变送器上壳连有热电偶烧毁保护接线.

sentences.en: Thermocouple hole outlet, outlet and a good location Hough mouth.
sentences.cn: 把热电偶孔进风口, 出风口和哈夫口定位好.

sentences.en: They should be checked frequently against a standard thermocouple.
sentences.cn: 它们经常要用标准热电偶来校对.

sentences.en: When a kiln rotates, the thermocouple periodically contacts feed solids materials.
sentences.cn: 因窑炉转动 、 物料和热电偶周期接触,引起测量温度周期性变化.

words.tran_cn: 热电子的，[物] 热离子的
[电] 温差电学，[物] 热电学

trans.tran_cn: 热电偶（热电偶是根据热电效应测量温度的传感器，是温度测量仪表中常用的测温元件），温差电偶
trans.tran_en: a device for measuring temperature consisting of a pair of wires of different metals or semiconductors joined at both ends. One junction is at the temperature to be measured, the second at a fixed temperature. The electromotive force generated depends upon the temperature difference
